demos.title: Testing Intro
demos.teaches: Set up Vitest with Angular and write your first unit test. Understand test structure with describe/it blocks and basic assertions.

demos.title: Test Pipe
demos.teaches: Unit test Angular pipes in isolation by instantiating the pipe class directly and asserting transform output.

demos.title: Test Directive
demos.teaches: Test attribute directives by creating a host component in TestBed and asserting DOM changes caused by the directive.

demos.title: Simple Service
demos.teaches: Test a service class without DI by instantiating it directly. Verify methods and state mutations in isolation.

demos.title: Service Http
demos.teaches: Test Angular services that use HttpClient with HttpTestingController. Flush mock responses and verify request URLs and methods.

demos.title: Service BS Http
demos.teaches: Test a service that uses BehaviorSubject for local state alongside HttpClient. Verify Observable emissions and state management.

demos.title: Comp Test Class
demos.teaches: Test component logic by instantiating the class directly (no TestBed). Fast and simple for components without template dependencies.

demos.title: Comp Inject Spy
demos.teaches: Use jasmine.createSpyObj to mock injected services in TestBed. Verify component behaviour when the service spy returns specific values.

demos.title: Comp Spy returnValue
demos.teaches: Mock a service dependency in TestBed with createSpyObj and .and.returnValue to control Observable outputs. Assert DOM state and service interactions.

demos.title: Comp Write / Read DOM
demos.teaches: Write to signal state and read DOM output after detectChanges. Use nativeElement queries to assert rendered text and attributes.

demos.title: Comp Events
demos.teaches: Trigger DOM events and verify signal output emissions. Use fixture.debugElement to dispatch synthetic events and assert component reactions.

demos.title: Comp Input Signals
demos.teaches: Set signal inputs on a component under test using fixture.componentRef.setInput(). Assert rendered output and required input validation.

demos.title: Comp Material Harness
demos.teaches: Use Angular Material component test harnesses to interact with Material UI elements in specs without coupling tests to DOM internals.

demos.title: Comp Async
demos.teaches: Handle async operations in tests using fakeAsync/tick and whenStable. Test components that load data asynchronously.

demos.title: Comp Material Async
demos.teaches: Combine Material test harnesses with async/await to interact with Material components that have asynchronous rendering.

demos.title: Comp Nested Integration
demos.teaches: Write integration tests that render a parent component with real child components. Verify the full component tree without shallow mocking.

demos.title: Comp Marbles
demos.teaches: Use RxJS marble testing to assert Observable timing and emission sequences. Ideal for testing services with complex async pipelines.

demos.title: NgRx Mock Store
demos.teaches: Test NgRx-connected components with MockStore and provideMockStore. Override selectors at test-time without dispatching real actions.

demos.title: NgRx Reducers
demos.teaches: Unit test NgRx reducers as pure functions by passing state and actions directly. Verify state transitions without TestBed.

demos.title: Mock Signals Store
demos.teaches: Mock an NgRx Signal Store in component tests by providing a fake store that returns signals. Assert component output based on signal values.

demos.title: Test Signals Store
demos.teaches: Integration-test an NgRx Signal Store with a real service spy. Verify store state changes after calling store methods.

demos.title: Cypress
demos.teaches: Introduction to Cypress for end-to-end testing. Learn the difference between unit tests and E2E tests and when to use each approach.

comments.title: Using @ngrx/store
comments.comment: To use @ngrx/store, we need to install it first.

comments.title: Optimizing change detection
comments.comment: In order to optimize change detection, we need to use OnPush strategy.
